name: Tropical Energy Blast
tagline: Mango, pineapple, and coconut water for all-day energy

steps.label: PREP
steps.text: Add mango, pineapple, and banana to blender

steps.label: ADD
steps.text: Pour in coconut water and lime juice

steps.label: BLEND
steps.text: Blend on high until smooth and creamy

steps.label: POUR
steps.text: Pour into glass and enjoy immediately

tip: Add a scoop of chia seeds for extra omega-3s and sustained energy
variations: Add 1/2 cup frozen passion fruit for tropical tang
Blend in 1 tbsp hemp seeds for plant-based protein
Use fresh ginger for a spicy kick

name: Matcha Green Power
tagline: Matcha and spinach for clean, focused energy without the crash

steps.label: ADD
steps.text: Combine spinach, banana, and matcha powder

steps.label: POUR
steps.text: Add almond milk and honey

steps.label: BLEND
steps.text: Blend until vibrant green and smooth

tip: Use frozen banana for creamier texture and skip the ice
variations: Add 1/2 avocado for healthy fats
Swap honey for dates for refined sugar-free
Add a handful of mint leaves for fresh flavor

name: Coffee Banana Kickstart
tagline: Cold brew and banana for a breakfast energy boost in seconds

steps.label: PREP
steps.text: Add banana, almond butter, and cold brew

steps.label: ADD
steps.text: Pour in oat milk and maple syrup

steps.label: BLEND
steps.text: Blend until frothy and creamy

tip: Freeze leftover coffee in ice cube trays for extra coffee flavor
variations: Add 1 scoop vanilla protein powder
Use espresso instead of cold brew for stronger kick
Blend in cacao nibs for mocha flavor

name: Peanut Butter Power Shake

steps.text: Combine peanut butter, banana, and oats

steps.label: POUR

steps.label: BLEND
steps.text: Blend until thick and creamy

steps.label: POUR

variations: Use chocolate protein powder for Reese's flavor
Add 1 tbsp flax seeds for omega-3s

name: Greek Berry Blast

steps.text: Blend all ingredients until smooth and creamy

steps.label: POUR
steps.text: Pour and sprinkle extra cinnamon on top

tip: The fiber and healthy fats create lasting fullness to curb cravings

Include 1 tbsp hemp seeds for protein
Mix in 1/4 tsp vanilla extract

steps.text: Blend all ingredients until smooth and creamy

steps.label: POUR

steps.label: ADD

steps.text: Blend on high for 45 seconds until smooth

steps.label: POUR
steps.text: Pour and drink daily for glowing skin from within

tip: Vitamin C from berries helps your body produce and absorb collagen better

Mix in 1/4 tsp vanilla extract

steps.text: Pour into glass and enjoy beauty nutrients

Include 1 tbsp hemp seeds for omega-3s

variations: Add 1/2 tsp maca powder for adaptogen benefits

name: Midnight Velvet

steps.label: BLEND
steps.text: Combine all ingredients until silky smooth
